content.question: The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals x cubed minus 3 x squared minus 18 x"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>18</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the function <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared minus 2 x minus 35"><semantics><mrow><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>35</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Let <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> be the function given by <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator h open parentheses x close parentheses over denominator g open parentheses x close parentheses end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the domain of <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​all real numbers <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> where <math alttext="x not equal to 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​all real numbers <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> where <math alttext="x not equal to negative 5"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 7"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​all real numbers <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> where <math alttext="x not equal to negative 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 6"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​all real numbers <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> where <math alttext="x not equal to negative 5"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to negative 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 6"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 7"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​all real numbers <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> where <math alttext="x not equal to negative 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, <math alttext="x not equal to 6"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 1.11: Equivalent Representations of Polynomial and Rational Expressions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
